ratata nawa nithi paddhathiyak gena emin rata godanagimata ethumata hakiyawa thibena bawa wishwasayi.singappuruwe rafal siti sappu sankirnaye di pasugiyada shri lankawe hastha karmantha shilpinge nirmana athulath alewi pradarshanayak pawathwuni.shri lankiya hastha karmantha shilpin wisi dedeneku sahabhagi wu ema pradarshanaya singappuruwe shri lanka maha komasaris jeyathri samarakon menawiyage pradhanathwayen wiwrutha kerunu athara wiwrutha kirime awasthawata ek wu khemarama himiyo mese da sandahan kalaha.aasiyawe dawanthama welenda polawal athara pramukha sthanaye pasuwana welenda polak lesa singappuruwa handunwanna puluwan.
